body:
Hi Lucio,

I would say John Mardaljevic's thesis is the masterwork of Radiance
validations.  Available by request, see this link for details:

http://www.iesd.dmu.ac.uk/~jm/thesis.html

- Rob Guglielmetti
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] Looking for some pubblications for my thesys.
subject: [Radiance-general] Looking for some pubblications for my thesys.
